name: Katadyn MicroPur MP1 Water Treatment Tablets
description: A self-stable, easy-to-use water treatment option that purifies using chlorine dioxide. Effective against viruses, bacteria, giardia, and cryptosporidium. It'scurrently the only chemical treatment that doesn't require pre-filtering. MicroPur tablets suit hikers, travellers and campers wishing to avoid iodine treatments.Contains 30 tablets. Each tablet treats 1L of water.Tastes like fresh water without chemical tastes.
